II. Purpose of Addendum
The licensee has requested the addition of independent living services to the terms
of their current child placing agency license. The purpose of this addendum is to
document compliance and intentions of compliance with licensing rules related to
independent living services.
III. Methodology
2/26-27/2008 Interim review of current child placing agency license.
4/16/2008 Received written request from licensee for addition of independent
living services as a term for the license.
4/16/2008 Received policies and procedures and other related information
required by licensing rules to provide independent living services.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
This agency currently maintains a regular license as a child-placing agency –
private. An interim review was conducted on 2/26-27/2008. This evaluation
assessed substantial compliance and an approved corrective action plan was
received for the areas of noncompliance that were identified. The agency submitted
a written request for the addition of independent living services as a term to this
license. The program statement, policies and procedures, staffing and other related
information required for compliance with licensing rules for independent living
services were also submitted and reviewed. The information submitted establishes
compliance with the related rules. The application and implementation of the
information submitted will demonstrate the intention of maintaining compliance with
the licensing criteria for independent living services. This agency has adequate
staffing and professional and financial resources to provide independent living
services as a term for their child placing agency license.
V. Recommendation
I approve the request for the addition of independent living services as a term for this
child placing agency license.
